conversation-text: Christopher Foyle: (barging in on a closed meeting) Good morning. James Wintringham: Mr. Foyle. I'm afraid this isn't a very good moment. Foyle: Well, not for you, perhaps. Perfectly good one for me. Wintringham: What can I do for you? Foyle: You can start by apologizing for wasting my time and perhaps explain how you manage to achieve the, uh, levels of incompetence you regularly do.
